articles.author: Kevin Liptak and Matt Egan, CNN
articles.title: Here's what Joe Biden can -- and can't -- do to fight inflation - CNN
articles.description: Soaring inflation is quickly becoming a political liability for President Joe Biden, who has shifted his public message to acknowledging the problem and commiserating with Americans over higher prices.

articles.title: US taking 'big bet' on Australia and nuclear submarines - 9News
